org.eclipse.dataset.roi

Interface IROI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    INameable, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IFitROI, IOrientableROI, IParametricROI, IPolylineROI, IRectangularROI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CircularROI, EllipticalROI, FreeDrawROI, GridROI, HyperbolicROI, Line3DROI, LinearROI, OrientableROIBase, ParabolicROI, PerimeterBoxROI, PointROI, PolygonalROI, PolylineROI, RectangularROI, RingROI, ROIBase, SectorROI, XAxisBoxROI, XAxisLineBoxROI, YAxisBoxROI, YAxisLineBoxROI

    public interface IROI
extends java.io.Serializable, INameable
    Region of interest interface. A region may be one or two dimensional and may enclose an area. If it is open (or does not enclose an area) then a point is consider to be inside it when it lies on its outline to within the accuracy given by that point's coordinates.
